name: Surf, Turf, and Perch
desc: A large platter with a mix of meat and vegetables. Various ingredients from the sea, land, and air have been roasted and mixed together. There's something for everyone here, making it a must-have at any important banquet in Natlan.

value.text: Decreases all party members' gliding and sprinting Stamina consumption by 20% for 900s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

customize.name: Recipe: Surf, Turf, and Perch
customize.desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Surf, Turf, and Perch.

customize.name: Delicious Surf, Turf, and Perch
customize.desc: A large platter with a mix of meat and vegetables. Thick, juicy chunks of meat have soaked up all the spices, mingling delightfully with the crispness of the fruit and vegetables on the tip of your tongue, touching more than just your taste buds, as your stomach is also moved to satisfaction. No wonder this dish has so many loyal fans.

customize.name: Suspicious Surf, Turf, and Perch
customize.desc: A large platter with a mix of meat and vegetables. First, you find yourself biting into a half-raw skewer of meat; next, a chunk of charred fish. The contrast is so jarring that you simply can't muster up the courage to take a third bite...

customize.name: Chasca
customize.desc: The Peacemaker of the Tlalocan, the ender of all disputes.

customize.name: Moment of Respite
customize.desc: Chasca's specialty. Piled high with ingredients, few can resist the aroma of this dish. Even someone in the midst of an argument might find their anger turn to hunger at the mere whiff of it. Wait a moment, those Saurians who were rolling around in the distance just now... Why have they suddenly started looking this way too?

customize.name: Surf, Turf, and Perch
customize.desc: A large platter with a mix of meat and vegetables. Various ingredients from the sea, land, and air have been roasted and mixed together. There's something for everyone here, making it a must-have at any important banquet in Natlan.

customize.name: Fowl
customize.desc: A fresh chunk of fowl. Handled properly, it can make a hearty meal.

customize.name: Raw Meat
customize.desc: A fresh chunk of meat. Handled properly, it can be used to make delicious food.

customize.name: Fish
customize.desc: A fresh fillet of fish. Handled properly, it can make a rich dish.

customize.name: Grainfruit
customize.desc: This plant is named after the giant grains that grow along the cob.
